name: Be Kind, Rewind
description:
The year is 1988 and you are a clerk at a video rental store. Greet and chat with customers when they're ready to check out. Meanwhile, rewind returns at the orange rewind station.

The better your service, the “kinder” the customer will be and the closer to rewound they'll return their tapes. 

If too many tapes pile up, it's Game over!

        -----------------------------------

WASD to move, cursor to look. 

Left click or Space to interact
